abstract: Pope Francis pushes open bronze Holy Door of St Peter's Basilica in Vatican City as part of ceremony to open Holy Year known as Jubilee; states passage through door, which 10 million Roman Catholics are expected to undertake over course of year, represents communion with God's mercy, value Francis emphasizes in  increasingly fraught world.
lead_paragraph: Amid heavy security, Francis reinforced his vision of a more merciful and less judgmental church, one that is open to all, including sinners.

headline.main: Pope Francis Calls for ‘God’s Mercy’ at Start of Yearlong Jubilee
headline.print_headline: Francis Opens a Holy Door and a Year of Mercy

snippet: Amid heavy security, Francis reinforced his vision of a more merciful and less judgmental church, one that is open to all, including sinners.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
